page.title: 15WELSH SHEEP
page.content: {Mr Coleman}has{400}Welsh sheep.They are small sheep that can survive on the cold hills.He doesn't keep the larger{Suffolk sheep}because they don't thrive very well on the hills.When he takes the Welsh lambs to market,he only gets{Â£8}each for them.If he had Suffolk sheep,he would get{Â£30}each.Welsh sheep have kemp in their fleece.Kemp is little pieces of dead wool.Mr Coleman doesn't get much money for the Welsh sheep's{fleeces because the{kemp}can't be dyed properly,so it is only used for making carpets or felt.
